page.title: 11CHELFORD SCHOOL
page.content: {CHELFORD SCHOOL}_ School activities - "English"-different stories and language work."Reading Directions"- learning to understand reading. "Homework"-spellings,vocabulary work, maths."History","Geography","R.E" and "Science"."Mathematics"-Alpha and Beta books,Maths Adventure and More Practice."Music"-Recorder,piano,songs, guitar."Craft"-Sewing and making things."Art"-Painting and drawing pictures."Project work"-for example 'Water'."Swimming"-All the Juniors go swimming at Wilmslow every week. "Games"-We do not do many games because we have only a playground.We use the village playing field,near the Parish hall,for field games."Events"- we go to other schools to take part in races and games."Special P.E."-We go to Knutsford High School to do gym. "Outside Visits"-when we can.
